subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: Inform the planet!?
author: Zack Widup
full_text:
If anyone has any catalin vacuum-tube radios they'd like to throw my
way, I'll take them! Especially the Fada "bullet radios."
:-)

Zack


On 2/25/11, harpo103 <rmc103@...> wrote:
> So........................chuck the ghoxtboxes then?
> Or just use radios with vacuum tubes?
>
> --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, SnowfireL@... wrote:
>>
>> This is going to really sound weird to most folks, but both rich and poor
>>
>> people should go back to living as it was at the turn of 1900, only keep
>> the
>>  good things, like medicine, and start parking the cars and trucksfor
>> awhile,  for at least twice a week, use the horse's again, for buggy or
>> riding
>> them  to work.  <g>  Stop the cutting of all wood for at least a year  or
>> two,
>> reuse some of the old stuff, stop using planes, unless in emergency,  and
>> go back to using trains again, maybe just steam engine.  Keep the
>> electricity, but, we should work on building more Solar panel's on homes,
>>  wind
>> turbines, and at least be granted big discounts by government to have
>> these
>> things installed in our homes.  People would lose some jobs, but they
>> could  do
>> similar without all the stress, Pilots could take on crop dusting for a
>> while, lol  forest and land developers could become growers, planters for
>> new
>> trees.  Stop tearing out mountains for awhile, let the trees take root,
>> so
>> what if we must go the long way for awhile or things take more time, there
>>
>> would be less land slides.  With less driving would be less need for oil,
>>
>> less pumping, stop with the fishing for awhile too, over 90% of the oceans
>>
>> are  now being over harvested!  If we could stop eating so much of any one
>>
>> thing, things could improve, thing is, this whole world would need to see
>> things  this way in order to save itself.  We may not be getting as warm
>> as we
>> think, even worse we are more then likely going into an ice age if we are
>> not  careful, and the world is becoming off balance, or is shifting, and
>> just
>> melting  away without it's internal support system.  I think your right,
>> Frank.  sf
>> more vids:
>>
>> _http://www.youtube.com/user/Snowfirel_
>> (http://www.youtube.com/user/Snowfirel)
>>
>>
>>
>> In a message dated 2/23/2011 12:26:11 P.M. Eastern Standard Time,
>> purplealiengirl@... writes:
>>
>>
>>
>>
>> What happend to guy spouting all the new age-crystal skulls-spirit stuff?
>>
>> Is it decernment, or denial? When you look at the weather, the
>> earthquakes,
>> the actions of humanity--getting dumber and dumber by the day, the active
>>
>> debunking going on, the lack of news coverage for comets--it begins to
>> look
>> like something is going on. I don't buy the Jesus stuff either, but that
>> doesn't negate the facts.
>>
>> As far other planets in the solar system, I  think "science" has it all
>> wrong, I think most are habitable in some form. I  got voices saying they
>> came
>> from the sixth planet, presumably in this system,  and once again I have
>> ask, how would anyone else "know better"? I don't  believe constant and
>> daily
>> Earthquakes are the norm, or they wouldn't be  mentioned in the bible as a
>>
>> sign of the times. I think this planet is severely  fractured, and very
>> little
>> holding it together.
>> What happens when you  don't keep moving parts lubricated--as in pulling
>> out all the natural oil of  the planet? I think we are living on a future
>> asteroid belt as it ceases up  and flies apart. Yet again, how would
>> anyone
>> "know better"? With only a slight  amount of research, anyone can punch
>> holes in
>> every "scientific" theory all  day long. Some dweeb in a university has a
>> thought and it becomes gospel. Some  duffus does a "thought experiment"
>> and
>> it's irrefutable--how the f--- does  that work!? You think it, therefore
>> it
>> is by virture of titles and degree? If  you don't have titles and degrees,
>>
>> anything you think of is nonsensical.
>>
>> yeah, rambling of a lunatickingnutcase.
>>
>> F-S
>>
